channel.title: Refeshing an iframe with a button?
channel.description:
Hello, I recently got a page to highlight all with a click in the box, but I wanted to try highlighting all with a button,
http://playelite.org/work/php/usingphp.html
Refreshing an iframe with a button?
Hello, this is my iframe code:
[code]<iframe name="frame1" src="http://playelite.org/work/php/test.php" width="200" height="25" style="border:0px inset #ff0000" > </iframe>[/code]
How would I make it refresh with a button?
Thanks

item.title: Refeshing an iframe with a button?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

[quote=“imjohn10, post:2, topic:242971”]<img onclick="SelectAll('txtarea2')" src="/work/php/highlightbutton.gif" width="104" border="0" height="22" />

Should work fine.[/quote]

Thanks. POST SOLVED.

Read full topic
item.source: Refeshing an iframe with a button?

item.title: Refeshing an iframe with a button?
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

<img onclick="SelectAll('txtarea2')" src="/work/php/highlightbutton.gif" width="104" border="0" height="22" />

Should work fine.

Read full topic
